reviewText: Great new ideas blending dancing and pilates.  Wonderful for dancers to try as it feels so familiar.  Easy to follow for any dancer.  Well worth the money.

I found the Julian Littleford workout to be a great addition to my current weight training and cardio workouts. The direction that he provides on how to perform the moves is very clear and easy to follow. I also like the fact that, now that I know the moves and no longer need so much direction, I can forward past the breakdown straight to my workout. It is very apparent that Julian Littleford is passionate about Pilates and how it compliments dance.
